translation.en: -Do step class. -It's making my head spin...
translation.zh: -做踩阶运动-想到我们可以做...

translation.en: -...how many activities we can do. -Play Army men.
translation.zh: -那么多活动，我头就发晕-玩军队仗阵

translation.en: Hey, I never asked you. Do you like guacamole?
translation.zh: 我都没问你你喜欢吃酪梨酱吗？

translation.en: Oh, Brennan! Oh, God!
translation.zh: 喔，柏南！老天！ 柏南！柏南！

translation.en: Brennan! Brennan!
translation.zh: 柏南！柏南！ 爸！南西！大事不好了！

translation.en: Dad. Nancy. It's bad.
translation.zh: 爸！南西！大事不好了！ 惨了啦！到处都血淋淋！

translation.en: It's so bad. There's blood everywhere.
translation.zh: 惨了啦！到处都血淋淋！ 上下铺这点子根本行不通你们为什么让我们那样做？

translation.en: The bunk beds were a terrible idea. Why'd you let us do that?
translation.zh: 上下铺这点子根本行不通你们为什么让我们那样做？

translation.en: It's so bad!
translation.zh: 大事不好了啦！

translation.en: How would you describe that?

translation.en: -It's not so bad. -Right. See?
translation.zh: -不太痛-好...瞧？

translation.en: Put your beds back.

translation.en: Rumpus time is over.

translation.en: You got a big day tomorrow. You need your eight hours.
translation.zh: 你们明天是大日子你们需要有充足睡眠

translation.en: And although she was 88 years old, she never stopped believing.
translation.zh: 即便她已经八十八岁她一直都坚信...

translation.en: It's 8:20 in the a.m.
translation.zh: 那是早上八点二十分

translation.en: Coming up next, a recent study by the American Council....
translation.zh: 接下来是美国协会最新研究...

translation.en: Look at her. She's hot.
translation.zh: 瞧她，好性感喔

translation.en: Okay, guys, this is it. Good luck. Don't be late.

translation.en: Dad, I need to borrow some clothes for the interview...

translation.en: ...since I don't have any fancy clothes.
translation.zh: 我没有正式的衣服

translation.en: You go in my closet, take whatever you need. You guys gotta look sharp.
translation.zh: 到我的衣橱去找随便你穿，你们得体面一点

translation.en: This is the most important day of our lives.
translation.zh: 这可是我们今生最重要的一日

translation.en: -Okay. -No pressure, no pressure.
translation.zh: -好的-没有压力...

translation.en: -All right? Relax. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好吧？放轻松-好的

translation.en: I gotta go. I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: This is your day. Remember that. You own it.
translation.zh: 你们今天好好表现一定可以的！

translation.en: -This is your one day! -All right.
translation.zh: -今天一定会成功！-好的

translation.en: Mr. Huff, Mr. Jeener is ready for your interview.
translation.zh: 赫夫先生吉纳先生已准备好面试了

translation.en: Actually, we'll be interviewing as a team.
translation.zh: 我们要一起接受面试

translation.en: We're here to fuck shit up.
translation.zh: 我们要连手叱咤风云！

translation.en: Move it!
translation.zh: 走开！

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Well, Brennan, you certainly have had a lot of jobs.
translation.zh: 柏南，看来你有许多工作经验

translation.en: I'm a bit of a spark plug.
translation.zh: 我只是颗小火星塞

translation.en: And, Human Resources lady, when I think--
translation.zh: 人事部小姐，我认为...

translation.en: -You know, it's-- Actually, it's Pam. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -我的名字是潘姆-对不起

translation.en: -Well, Pan.... -No, my name is Pam.
translation.zh: -潘恩-不，我叫潘姆

translation.en: -Are you saying Pan or Pam? -I'm saying Pam.
translation.zh: -妳说的是潘恩还是潘姆？-我说的是潘姆

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sorry, who is this gentleman sitting behind you?
translation.zh: 对不起，坐在你身后的那位先生是谁？

translation.en: Hello, Ms. Lady. I'm Dale. I'm Brennan's stepbrother...
translation.zh: 哈啰，小姐妳好我是戴尔，柏南的继兄 我想我应该有办法解决〝潘恩或潘姆〞的窘境

translation.en: ...and I think I might be able to help with the Pan-Pam dilemma.
translation.zh: 我想我应该有办法解决〝潘恩或潘姆〞的窘境

translation.en: -Yeah, that'd be great. -Pam.
translation.zh: -那太好了-潘姆 -潘恩-潘姆

translation.en: -Pan. -Pam.
translation.zh: -潘恩-潘姆 -潘恩德，后面有个〝德〞字-是〝姆〞

translation.en: -Pand. There's a D on the end. -With an M.
translation.zh: -潘恩德，后面有个〝德〞字-是〝姆〞 -没有〝德〞，是〝潘姆〞-就像〝康姆〞...念〝康恩姆〞

translation.en: -There's no D. It's Pam. -It's like "comb," except P-A-N-M.
translation.zh: -没有〝德〞，是〝潘姆〞-就像〝康姆〞...念〝康恩姆〞 -原来是有个〝恩〞-两个姆，原来是搞错了

translation.en: -N-N. There's two N's. -Two M's. That was the confusion.
translation.zh: -原来是有个〝恩〞-两个姆，原来是搞错了

translation.en: No, there's just one M.
translation.zh: 不，只有一个〝姆〞

translation.en: What do you say we interview you?
translation.zh: 我们来面试你，如何？

translation.en: All right. Yes, that's a sometimes-useful exercise.
translation.zh: 好的，这有时是不错的练习

translation.en: Please put your hand down. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 请放下你的手开始吧

translation.en: How much money do you make a year before taxes?
translation.zh: 你每年扣税之前的收入是多少？

translation.en: Okay, I'm actually not comfortable answering that.
translation.zh: 对于这问题我不太方便回答

translation.en: -Come on! -We're doing the interview, not you.
translation.zh: -别这样嘛！-是我们在面试，不是你耶！

translation.en: Here's a shot out of a cannon: Oprah, Barbara Walters, your wife.
translation.zh: 好的，回答以下问题欧普拉，芭芭拉华特斯，你老婆...

translation.en: You gotta fuck one, marry one, kill one. Go!
translation.zh: 你得搞一个，娶一个，杀一个快回答！

translation.en: I think we're done here. Thank you.
translation.zh: 面试就到此结束谢谢两位

translation.en: First of all, I needed someone to work--
translation.zh: 首先，我要找的人是...

translation.en: Wait, shut your mouth. Shut your mouth.
translation.zh: 等等...闭上嘴巴！闭嘴！

translation.en: I think we've had enough--
translation.zh: 我想我们已经进行够了...

translation.en: -Shush up for one second. -Shut your mouth.
translation.zh: -请闭上嘴一秒钟-闭上嘴巴

translation.en: -Wait, shut your mouth. -I'm sorry, what did you just say?
translation.zh: -等等...闭上嘴巴！-对不起，你刚才说什么？

translation.en: -You're just coming off stupid. -I'm coming off stupid?
translation.zh: -妳真的很蠢耶-我很蠢？

translation.en: You're wearing tuxedos to a job that requires you to clean bathrooms.
translation.zh: 你穿燕尾服来应征扫厕所的工作

translation.en: -Please leave this office, we're done. -Do we get any sort of souvenir?
translation.zh: -请离开这里，面试结束-我们有纪念品可拿吗？

translation.en: Get out of my office!
translation.zh: 滚出我的办公室！

translation.en: I'm looking to hire guys I don't mind hanging out with for 12 hours a day.
translation.zh: 我要找一个每天一起相处十二个钟头的人

translation.en: You guys seem like cool guys.
translation.zh: 你们看起来挺上道的

translation.en: Got hair similar to mine, you wear tuxedos to the interview.
translation.zh: 发型和我差不多穿燕尾服来面试

translation.en: That's funny, it's ironic. I get that.
translation.zh: 很有趣，很反讽我瞭你们

translation.en: Underplaying the whole formality of it. I think that's funny as hell.
translation.zh: 你们故意讽刺正经八百的那一套我觉得太爆笑了

translation.en: So let's do this, you know? You guys are hired. You're in.
translation.zh: 好的，就这样吧你们被录用了！

translation.en: Unless you're the weirdest guys ever and I don't see it.
translation.zh: 除非你们是大怪胎但我倒看不出来

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: -Was that a fart? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -你刚放屁？-我不知道

translation.en: I can taste it.
translation.zh: 我能尝得出来

translation.en: On my tongue.
translation.zh: 就在我舌尖

translation.en: Okay, I'll be honest with you. I did fart.
translation.zh: 好的，我老实讲我的确放了屁

translation.en: Is that onion? Onion and-- Onion and ketchup.
translation.zh: 是洋葱吗？洋葱和...洋葱和蕃茄酱

translation.en: -It stinks. And this is a small room. -Shit.
translation.zh: -好臭！而且这房间这么小-真是的

translation.en: Okay, now the tuxedos seem kind of fucked up.

translation.en: God. We were so close.
translation.zh: 老天，我们差点就得到那份工作

translation.en: So, what do we do for jobs? Is your dad really gonna kick us out?
translation.zh: 工作的事怎么办？你爸真的会把我们踢出门？

translation.en: Listen, don't worry about my dad.
translation.zh: 听着，别担心我老爸

translation.en: Got him sewn up.
translation.zh: 一切都在我掌握之中

translation.en: We've gotta start thinking bigger, though, Brennan.
translation.zh: 但我们必须眼光放远，柏南

translation.en: Listen, what are you really good at?
translation.zh: 你的专长究竟是什么？

translation.en: Singing. I'm a world-class singer.
translation.zh: 唱歌，我是世界级歌手

translation.en: See? Right there, that's an amazing skill.
translation.zh: 哇！那便是很厉害的技能！

translation.en: Now, what am I good at?
translation.zh: 那我有什么专长呢？

translation.en: I can shred on the drums and I'm a marketing wiz.
translation.zh: 我很会打鼓而且对营销很有一套

translation.en: Put all that together, what do you get?
translation.zh: 整合所有一切这样成了什么？

translation.en: -I don't know, a band? -No, that's been done before.
translation.zh: -不晓得，一个乐团？-不，那个别人已经做过了

translation.en: Even better: we are gonna start an international entertainment company.
translation.zh: 我们可以成立一间国际娱乐公司

translation.en: The biggest and the best.
translation.zh: 规模最大最赞的公司！

translation.en: And we're gonna call it Prestige Worldwide.
translation.zh: 我们就叫它全球名流公司

translation.en: That sounds so cool.
translation.zh: 听起来好正点！

translation.en: I feel like a lightning bolt hit the tip of my penis.
translation.zh: 我感觉好像命根子顶端被雷打中了一样

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: We're brothers. This is why we met.
translation.zh: 咱们是兄弟这便是咱们相遇的命运

translation.en: -To form this alliance, right? -Right?
translation.zh: -成立这阵线联盟，对吧？-是吧？

translation.en: That's why our parents met, so this idea could happen.
translation.zh: 所以我们父母才会相遇好衍生出这点子

translation.en: -Okay, what do we do? -We get to work.
translation.zh: -好，我们要做什么？-咱们开始动手吧

translation.en: And we hit the beat laboratory right now. Let's go.
translation.zh: 咱们现在就往节奏实验室前进走吧！

translation.en: -What? -Wait.
translation.zh: -什么？-等等

translation.en: What time is it?
translation.zh: 现在几点了？
-四点半-四点半
四点三十二分

translation.en: -I can't go down Whitworth right now. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我现在没办法经过惠沃斯街-好的

translation.en: We should go this way.
translation.zh: 我们应该走这边

translation.en: -What's up? -Chris Gardocki.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？-克里斯贾多奇

translation.en: -What? -He gets in my face...
translation.zh: -什么？-他老爱找我麻烦

translation.en: ...and I just don't wanna deal with the hassle now.
translation.zh: 我现在不想惹麻烦

translation.en: -Are you this scared? -Can we please go the long way?
translation.zh: -你这么害怕？-我们可以绕远路吗？

translation.en: -Down Cutler? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -走卡特勒路？-是的

translation.en: But that's 45 minutes.
translation.zh: 可是那要走四十五分钟

translation.en: You're gonna shame me into doing this.
translation.zh: 你故意要害我丢脸，好吧

translation.en: -You sound stupid. -You'll be sorry. Okay, I'm stupid.
translation.zh: -你太傻了吧-你会后悔的，好，我很傻

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Oh, God, there they are.
translation.zh: 老天，他们在那里

translation.en: Oh, my God, is that Dale Doback?
translation.zh: 老天，那是戴尔多拜克？

translation.en: -Let's make him lick dog shit. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -咱们叫他舔狗屎-对！

translation.en: Hey, fag-stick. Long time, no see.
translation.zh: 嘿，娘娘腔好久不见啰！

translation.en: Is that your boyfriend? Is that your butt buddy?
translation.zh: 那是你男朋友？你的屁眼好兄弟？

translation.en: Look, Mr. Gardocki, just leave me alone, will you?
translation.zh: 贾多奇先生请你别来烦我，好吧？

translation.en: Shut your mouth, esé.
translation.zh: 闭嘴！小子！

translation.en: You guys just go back and have fun on your jungle gym, okay?
translation.zh: 你们大家回去继续玩吊单杠好吧？

translation.en: Does butt buddy have a name?
translation.zh: 你的屁眼好兄弟有名字吗？

translation.en: If you're referring to me as butt buddy, yes, I do have a name.
translation.zh: 屁眼好兄弟如果是指我的话有的，我有名字

translation.en: It's Brennan Huff.
translation.zh: 我叫柏南赫夫

translation.en: If you don't come over here and lick that white dog shit...
translation.zh: 你要是不过来舔这白色狗屎...

translation.en: ...I'm gonna plow into your nose with my fist.
translation.zh: 我就用我的铁沙掌伺候你！

translation.en: -I'm not licking any white dog shit. -I'll lick the shit if you leave us alone.
translation.zh: -我才不要舔狗屎-我肯舔狗屎，如果你就放过我们

translation.en: Dale, you're not licking dog shit, okay? They're kids.
translation.zh: 戴尔，你不能舔狗屎他们只是小孩子 -柏南，不过是狗屎而已-太荒谬了！

translation.en: -Brennan, it's just dog shit. -It's ridiculous!
translation.zh: -柏南，不过是狗屎而已-太荒谬了！

translation.en: -Hello, how are--? -Oh, God!
translation.zh: -哈啰，你...？-喔，老天！

translation.en: Leave him alone! Leave him alone!
translation.zh: 别打他！别打他！

translation.en: Get them!
translation.zh: 教训他们！

translation.en: So maybe you don't go down that way anymore.
translation.zh: 或许你们以后别再走那条路了

translation.en: Maybe you go the long way home.
translation.zh: 就绕远路回家

translation.en: That's what we talked about. We'll take the long way home.
translation.zh: 我们已经讨论过了我们再来都要绕远路

translation.en: You know in that one scene in The Wizard of Oz...
translation.zh: 那就像《The Wizard of Oz》的其中一场戏...

translation.en: ...when the flying monkeys pull apart the Scarecrow?
translation.zh: 当飞猴把稻草人五马分尸那幕？

translation.en: That's what it was like.
translation.zh: 正是那种感觉

translation.en: -It's okay, it's okay. -I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: -没事的...没事-我真的很遗憾

translation.en: Is my dad mad about the stuff that happened?
translation.zh: 我爸对这件事很生气吗？

translation.en: Robert was very upset, yes.
translation.zh: 罗柏特是很不开心，没错

translation.en: He knows that you interviewed as a team.
translation.zh: 他知道你们俩一起进行面试

translation.en: And he heard about the fart.
translation.zh: 还有，他听说放屁的事

translation.en: -Oh, he did? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？-是的

translation.en: You just couldn't hold it, or you--?
translation.zh: 你是没办法忍住...还是...？

translation.en: -No. I thought it was gonna be silent. -It was not silent.
translation.zh: -我以为是无声的屁-才不是无声屁咧 根本忍不住，还发出声音真的好丢脸

translation.en: Just kept going, and it made a sound. It was embarrassing.
translation.zh: 根本忍不住，还发出声音真的好丢脸 还愈放愈大声

translation.en: It got louder.
translation.zh: 还愈放愈大声

translation.en: So listen, Bobby, I'll get those keys made tomorrow...
translation.zh: 听着，巴比我明天就去打钥匙...

translation.en: -...and then we'll start setting up times. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -然后我们便可以开始着手进行-谢谢你

translation.en: -Hi, Mom. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨，妈-嗨

translation.en: -Okay, bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -好的，拜-拜

translation.en: -Always nice to see you. -You too.
translation.zh: -真高兴见到妳-我也是

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿，两位...

translation.en: Looks like your free ride's over, huh?
translation.zh: 看来你们骗吃骗喝的日子已经结束

translation.en: Have fun living on the streets.
translation.zh: 祝你们露宿街头愉快

translation.en: Okay, cool. Good chatting, you guys. Bye, Mom.
translation.zh: 好的，和你们聊得真开心拜，妈

translation.en: -Bye. -See you, buddy.
translation.zh: -拜-再见！

translation.en: What was he doing here?
translation.zh: 他来做什么？

translation.en: We're putting the house on the market.
translation.zh: 我们打算卖掉这间房子

translation.en: -Where are we moving? -Is the house haunted?
translation.zh: -我们要搬去哪？-这房子闹鬼吗？

translation.en: Nancy and I are retiring...
translation.zh: 南西和我要退休... 驾驶我的船环游世界

translation.en: ...and sailing around the world on my boat.
translation.zh: 驾驶我的船环游世界

translation.en: We are living the dream.
translation.zh: 我们要实现我们的梦想

translation.en: Well, what about us?
translation.zh: 那我们呢？

translation.en: I'm sorry. Robert-- We thought that...
translation.zh: 很抱歉，罗柏特...我们认为...

translation.en: ...you should take responsibility for your own lives.
translation.zh: 你们应该对自己的生活负起责任 好消息...

translation.en: This is the exciting part:
translation.zh: 我们将在你们账户内存入足够的钱...

translation.en: We're going to put enough money in your accounts...
translation.zh: 我们将在你们账户内存入足够的钱... 好让你们付租公寓订金

translation.en: ...for a security deposit on an apartment.
translation.zh: 好让你们付租公寓订金

translation.en: What's this all about?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: More than just money, we're gonna get you another kind of support as well.
translation.zh: 不仅只是金钱我们还要给你们其他支持协助

translation.en: You're both gonna see therapists. Nancy thinks it'll help.
translation.zh: 你们要去做咨商南西认为那应该会有所帮助

translation.en: -Guys, that's nonnegotiable. -Hold on. We're not going on the boat...
translation.zh: -完全没有任何转圜余地-等等...我们没能跟上船...

translation.en: ...Derek's selling the house, we have to go to therapy?
translation.zh: 德瑞克要卖掉这间房子我们得去接受咨商？

translation.en: -What the fuck happened? -Hey!
translation.zh: -究竟在搞什么鬼啊？-嘿！

translation.en: Look, I know this seems really, really sudden...
translation.zh: 我知道这整件事感觉非常令人错愕...

translation.en: ...and just sort of unfair and cruel and--
translation.zh: 而且也有点不公平有点残忍...

translation.en: -But it's nonnegotiable. -But it's nonnegotiable.
translation.zh: -没有任何转圜余地-没有任何转圜余地

translation.en: I got a bellyful of white dog crap in me...
translation.zh: 我已经吃了一肚子狗大便...

translation.en: ...and now you lay this shit on me?
translation.zh: 现在你们又搞这种鸟事？！

translation.en: You're adults. It's time you started acting like adults.
translation.zh: 你们是成年人了你们得做出成年人的样子

translation.en: -Mom. -I'm not backing down, Brennan.
translation.zh: -妈-这次我不会退让的，柏南

translation.en: Don't even try.
translation.zh: 少打主意了

translation.en: I know it seems hard, but it's the best thing for both of you.
translation.zh: 我知道很难面对但这对你们是最理想的安排

translation.en: We do it because we love you.
translation.zh: 我们这么做是因为我们爱你们

零点零七九
